title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 279: Featuring Dave Bolland
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are back from vacation and joined by Dave Bolland. Dave joined (48:47) to talk about winning the Cup, playing in Chicago, playing in Toronto and a ton more. The guys also talked about the NHL returning to play and the new CBA. The fellas then break down the Calder and Jack Adams finalists and give their thoughts on who should win. The boys wrap up with some Golf talk (01:49:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
